Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerFetchExternalInputOptions(contextKey:botUuid:completion:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat input needs options that have to be fetched externally.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerChatConversationDidUpdate(chatConversationId:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat conversation has been updated.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerChatConversationContextDidUpdate(chatConversationId:inserts:updates:botContext:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat conversation context has been updated.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerAsyncTaskCalled(asyncTaskId:completion:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a bot needs an asynchronous task to be executed.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html.name: EPManagerDelegate
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html.abstract: The EPManager delegate protocol composed of methods allowing to catch specific EPManager events.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: online(majorVersion:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Downloads the latest available version of the bot from the Bot Editor.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: offline(fileName:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Load the bot from a json file embedded into the app bundle.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: onlineWithDefault(majorVersion:fileName:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Downloads the latest available version of the bot from the Bot Editor. In case of error, it will load the bot from a json file embedded into the app bundle.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html.name: EPBotFetchingStrategy
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html.abstract: Determines the method that will be used to fetch a bot.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: clearData()
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Clears all chat conversations and associated data.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: registerBot(uuid:fetchingStrategy:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Registers a new bot to the EPManager.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: controller(for:appearance:delegate:completion:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Creates a view controller for the given chat conversation and appearance.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: getChatConversation(forId:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Get an existing chat conversation for a given id.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: runBotOnChatConversation(chatConversation:botUuid:contextUpdate:replaceContext:completion:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Runs a bot on the given chat conversation.

Classes/EPManager.html.name: EPManager
Classes/EPManager.html.abstract: This manager is the 86% SDK entry point.
